content:
Nice to meet you, Jeyachandran! I'm Jeyachandran, the hiring officer, and I'll be conducting a technical round of your job interview today. Let's get started!

From your resume, I see that you have extensive experience in AI, machine learning, and full-stack development. Can you tell me more about your experience in AI project development? What kind of AI projects have you worked on, and what were your responsibilities in each project?
Hi sir I am Jay Chindran I am from Rajavaliyaam and I currently study in Kungqi Engineering College

Nice to meet you, Jeyachandran! I apologize for the confusion earlier. I noticed that your resume mentions your name as Jeyachandran, but you introduced yourself as Jay Chindran.

Moving on, I'd like to ask you again about your experience in AI project development. Since you're currently studying in KONGU Engineering College, I'm assuming you're pursuing a degree in AI and Machine Learning.

From your resume, I see that you developed an AI chatbot with real-time database integration and implemented voice automation for an e-commerce website. Could you tell me more about this project? What was your role in this project, and what were some of the challenges you faced while developing this chatbot?
